reviewText: I enjoyed this DVD. I have the book as well, but I liked being able to take notes from the video. There is also a little extra that isn't included in the book. She shows a class of preschoolers and how she works with them using various types of chairs and other accessories. She shows you some activities to develop sensory systems.

I thought the DVD was pricey for the amount of information given.  If you are already familiar with Sensory Processing, this DVD offers nothing new.  Even if you are brand new to Sensory Processiong, save the money and just read her book or any of the other books out there.  It will save you some $$$.
